title: 'Moment of truth' as world meets at climate summit
content: COP26 begins in Glasgow, amid dire warnings for the future if urgent climate action is not taken.

title: World leaders approve historic corporate tax deal
content: Leaders at the G20 in Rome endorse a proposal that sets a minimum tax rate of 15% on big businesses.

title: Jailed three times for refusing to join the army
content: Most Jewish Israelis do military service. But a small number, like Shahar, take an ideological stance.

title: Baldwin speaks about 'one in a trillion' shooting

title: Greta Thunberg mobbed as activists gather for COP26

title: Turbulence has hit relations with France - UK PM
content: But Boris Johnson says more unites France and the UK than divides them, despite a row over fishing.

title: Barcelona's Aguero in hospital for cardiac tests
content: Sergio Aguero is taken to hospital for tests after suffering "chest discomfort" as Barcelona draw their first match since the sacking of Ronald Koeman.

title: Saudis expel Lebanese ambassador amid Yemen row
content: The UAE, Kuwait and Bahrain also take diplomatic action in solidarity with the Saudis.

content: Archaeologists discovered the boat during construction work on a new tourist train network.

title: 'I feel free' - LGBT Afghan refugees arrive in UK
content: The BBC speaks to one of 29 LGBT refugees who fled the Taliban, fearing for their lives.

title: TV man known as the face of the USSR dies at 89
content: Soviet TV's chief newsreader anchored major events in the country that collapsed in 1991.

content: An eruption from an undersea volcano has coated the coastal waters off a Japanese island in pumice.
